snippet: Maria Elena Durazo, a labor leader, has pushed for safeguards for workers, including those not authorized to work in the United States, and an overhaul of immigration policy.
abstract: Maria Elena Durazo, executive secretary-treasurer of Los Angeles County Federation of Labor, has become one of most prominent labor leaders advocating for overhaul of country's immigration policies; Durazo presides over what is widely perceived as most successful group of unions in country.
lead_paragraph: Maria Elena Durazo, a labor leader, has pushed for safeguards for workers, including those not authorized to work in the United States, and an overhaul of immigration policy.

headline.seo: Los Angeles Labor Leader Puts Focus on Immigrants
headline.main: Immigrant Workers Give New Direction to Los Angeles Unions
headline.print_headline: Immigrant Workers Give New Direction To Los Angeles Unions

keywords.value: Los Angeles County Federation of Labor
keywords.name: organizations
